name: silent-belts-4
title: Silent Belts 4
author: Azias, Wakaba-chan, GotLag, Alan
description: Disables running sound for all belts, including modded ones.
For those who get annoyed with that squeaking noise chasing you all over the base.

name: belt-legacy
title: Belt Legacy
author: fishycat
description: Tired of accidentally replacing underground-belts and splitters with transport-belts?
Then this small mod is for you. When activated they can't fast-replace each other anymore.
For a safer bus building. For Vanilla and for Bob's basic, green and purple belt stuff.

name: SmallRobots
title: Small Robots - Just make the two robots a little smaller.
author: DellAquila, Kryzeth
description: Logistic Robot and Construction Robot are 50% smaller.
Better with mod More accurate player size compared to vehicles.
Work with all modded robots. You can set the size you want for your robots Smaller or Bigger.

name: SmallFixes
title: SmallFixes
author: Choumiko
description: Small non game changing/breaking fixes

name: ShowBotsOnMap
title: Show Bots On Map
author: darkfrei
description: Now you can see your robots on the map

name: Squeak Through
author: Nommy, Lupin, & Supercheese
description: Allows you to walk between what used to be obstacles such as directly adjacent
solar panels, pipes, steam engines, mining drills, and chests. No more frustration when walking about your base!

name: disable-decorations
title: Disable Decorations
author: Pithlit
description: This mod prevents placement of decoration elements at terrain generation.
Removing decorations will reduce the size of save-games. Other mods may place decoration elements manually.
Decorations from existing games will not be removed

name: Clean_Tree_Burning
title: Clean Tree Burning
author: Gegell
description: Burnt trees won't be left when burning forests

name: Noxys_QuickerStumpFade
title: Noxys Fading
author: Noxy
description: Configurable fade away times for various corpse entities (like biters, tree stumps, destroyed buildings).

name: RealisticReactorGlow
title: Realistic Reactor Glow
author: <NO_NAME>
description: The glow of working nuclear reactor has the proper color now!

name: Dont_lose_in_progress_ingredients
title: Don't lose in progress ingredients
author: Bilka
description: Fixes that ingredients of in-process crafting would be lost when changing recipe/mining the machine.

name: IondicatorsClassic
title: "Iondicators", Classic
author: KingIonTrueLove
description: Pretty inserter indicators. Pretty bad name.

name: LessUnplugged
title: Ion's UI Tweaks: Less Unplugged
author: KingIonTrueLove
description: Does that giant icon flashing in your face when you are building get annoying? Well I have the solution for you!

name: EnhancedFlashlight
title: Enhanced Flashlight
author: grfwoot
description: Replaces the default flashlight with a better, more realistic version

name: LightCone
title: Light Cone
author: darkfrei
description: Changes standart light cone of flashlight

name: fireproof-trains
title: Fireproof Trains
author: Alnet
description: Allow trains to drive through fire without taking damage. Should work with modded train types.

name: Shinys-fireproof-signals
title: Shinys fireproof signals
author: ShinyAfro
description: Makes train signals fire-proof

name: Smokeless
author: can00336
description: Removes UPS-hogging smoke from the game.

name: MultiConcrete
title: MultiConcrete
author: darkfrei
description: Concrete and Hazard Concrete is the same thing, just rotate it before placement

name: UnGirthyBorders
title: Ion's UI Tweaks: Smaller Borders
author: KingIonTrueLove
description: Reduces the size of the borders around menus and the toolbar, giving you more screen space. Also centers those darn arrows on the quickbar!

name: Brighten cells
title: [Z] Brighten cells
author: ZlovreD
description: Makes gui cells for inventory, technology, toolbars a little lighter (like as before)

name: longer-belts-redux
title: Longer Underground Belt (Aligned)
author: Peppe
description: Extends underground belt distance based on their speed.  Fixed optional mod bob's logistics.  Credit Schmendrick, Loren1350, for past versions

name: VehicleGrid
title: Vehicle Grid
author: Optera
description: Adds an equipment grid to any base or modded vehicle without grid.
cars 8x8, tanks 12x10, locomotives 10x8, wagons 10x6

name: NoArtilleryMapReveal
title: NoArtilleryMapReveal
author: JohnTheCF
description: Make artillery projectiles to not reveal map.

name: freenetworkwiring
title: Free Network Wiring
author: Vas
description: With the circuit network already being annoying as is,
no one wants to have to pay for thousands of wires! Not to mention,
blueprints give you the wires for free, so this mod makes the red and green wires free,
and is compatible with nearly any mod that alters those wires.
I'll add compatibility to other modded wires too if someone ever makes any other color wires.
